## Checks
- [ ] Passes PHPCS (WPCS) and PHPStan
- [ ] No direct output without escaping (`esc_html`, `esc_attr`, etc.)
- [ ] Nonces + capability checks for admin actions
- [ ] I18n ready (`__()`, `_e()`, `esc_html__()`) with a text domain
- [ ] No deprecated WP APIs used
